entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
